text: Hi Dana, not all email clients will support a background image, but we provide the colour fallback as a way to degrade to a semi-reasonable state. If you find ways to provide cross-client support we'd definitely be happy to find a way to provide that out of the box, but to date we haven't been able to find a way to do it so far. By the looks of things Outlook 2016 is a particularly problematic client
Could you confirm what you mean by override in this case? Any link functionality should work the same in the DND editor as the classic editor but if you can confirm I can double check for sure :+1:
